# releaseCGLContext(_:)

**Instance Method**

Releases the specified rendering context.

## Declaration

```swift
func releaseCGLContext(_ ctx: CGLContextObj)
```

## Parameters

- **ctx**: The rendering context to release.

## Discussion

This method is called when the OpenGL context that was previously returned by [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAOpenGLLayer/copyCGLContext(forPixelFormat:)] is no longer needed.

You should not call this method directly, it is intended to be overridden by subclasses.

## Managing the Rendering Context

- **copyCGLContext(forPixelFormat:)**: Returns the rendering context the receiver requires for the specified pixel format.
